name: Arcane Beak
storyline: You control Akari, a witchy chicken on a quest to find an ancient artifact. She ends up in the hands of a witchy fox who traps her in a maze of portals. Akari must feed the portals with the energy of their guardians before time runs out, or she will be trapped forever.
summary: This game was made for VimJam #5 by Róger Goulart. The Jam's focus was RACING and the theme was ESCAPE, with the following optional challenges: 4 color palette, only animal characters and mouse only. I couldn't do everything I wanted, but the game was fun and challenging.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Arcane Beak - Help the magical chicken Akari escape from a maze of portals before time runs out!
